JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Bricklayers wanted for renovation, Nykøbing F
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Moment is seeking two skilled bricklayers on behalf of a partner for a renovation project at a manufacturing company in Nykøbing F

Job Description
You will join a team with one other bricklayer. Together, you will independently carry out the following tasks:

  • Cleaning of floors, removing tiles, etc.
  • Laying tiles, creating food-approved floor coverings
  • Reparing the floor, including concrete flooring
  • Cutting ACO drains
  • Bricklaying around windows
  • Exterior sealing of windows and removable plastic plates inside for cleaning, etc.

We Offer

  • Expected start date: ASAP
  • Expected duration: 28.02.2025
  • Hourly wage: DKK 195
  • Working hours: 50 hours per week with rotation

Your Profile
We expect you to:

  • Have education as a bricklayer with solid experience
  • Be able to work independently on the tasks described
  • Have good teamwork skills
  • Be reliable and flexible
  • Speak and understand English

Interested?
If the above has caught your interest, we encourage you to send your CV today. Click on "Apply for job" and follow the application process.


We look forward to hearing from you!
